TITLE.P: Preliminary Market Consultation Relating to the Procurement of Design & Construction Works for MetroLink

SHORT_DESCR.P: MetroLink will provide a high speed, high capacity, high frequency, modern and efficient public transport service for people travelling along the Swords/Airport to City Centre corridor in Dublin. In addition, MetroLink will connect to the existing Luas Green Line in the South City area, enabling through running metro services from Swords to Sandyford, giving an overall metro length of approx. 26 kilometres. It is intended that MetroLink will commence construction in 2021 and will be open to passenger services by 2026/2027.
It is anticipated that MetroLink will include the following design services and construction works:
— Underground Tunnelling, Stations and associated works;
— At-grade and Elevated Track, Stations and associated works;
— Depot, stabling and Park and Ride facilities;
— Detailed design and construction management of all of the above.

The preliminary market consultation will afford TII an opportunity to explore market views, capacity, capability, and appetite relating to an initial outline procurement strategy, including packaging and contracting strategies.

1. Interested parties are invited to prepare a brief summary (maximum 2 pages) detailing contact details, their company’s expertise, capabilities and experience in delivering works similar to those required for the delivery of the MetroLink project by 6.4.2018;

2. In addition, interested parties are welcome (note this is optional) to provide an outline of the elements of MetroLink and tasks that they consider are most relevant to the services they provide by 6.4.2018; and

3. TII will provide an information pack on MetroLink which will be uploaded to www.etenders.gov.ie The information pack will include further details of MetroLink and a questionnaire for completion by the PIN closing date.

INFO_ADD.P: Interested parties will need to register on the etenders government website to download the Preliminary market consultation relating to the Procurement of design and construction works for MetroLink (PIN) document and provide submission response prior to the deadline dates for preliminary consultation and questionnaire.

Important: Any expenditure, work or effort undertaken by organisations or service providers is a matter solely for themselves and costs will not be reimbursed. It is emphasised that this is not a call for competition and therefore no tender documents are available.

— Provision of a further information pack and questionnaire, possible meetings and further engagement may be requested by TII of any works provider who submits a response. Any such engagements will be entirely at TII’s discretion. Participation or non-participation in any further engagement during this process will not prejudice or influence participation in any future tender competition nor guarantee or influence pre-qualification for any future competition;
— TII will not pay any compensation or fees for attending any meetings or engagements; and

— Following the preliminary market consultation, TII may publish a call for competition in due course. No competitive process will result from this advertisement; any future competitions concerning this matter will be subject to appropriate advertisement on www.etenders.gov.ie
